author: ajith
msg: 1. Adding the preliminary code for direct writing (discussed at http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=115046153600002&r=1&w=2)
I. Added a new ADBDataSource.java to act as the data source for ADB beans
II. modified the ADBBeanTemplate.xsl to have a getOMElement method in the ADBBean. The code is yet to be completed!
Note - Need the latest AXIOM jars to build this since this change depends on one of the AXIOM changes
